api_list.name: Company details
api_list.description:
Get company details such as
- about
- founded_year 
- funding
- industries
- location
- long_description
- size
- website
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crunchbase4.p.rapidapi.com/company"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crunchbase4.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://crunchbase4.p.rapidapi.com/company"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crunchbase4.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
